name: Quarantine Oh Quarantine (The Game) by SHT Musik
name_original: Quarantine Oh Quarantine (The Game) by SHT Musik
description: Based on the Great 2020 Pandemic,   Help your people escape to safety and avoid becoming monsters.   Bonus: an original song, Quarantine Oh Quarantine by SHT Musik .   Check out all SHT Musik at Bandcamp, see some videos on YouTube and visit my SHT Musik/Indie Music page on Facebook.    For fans of stuff like They Might Be Giants, XTC and true, slightly silly,   indie music in general.
